definitions.definition: A hybrid herb of the mint family ( Mentha × piperita ), formed by crossing watermint and spearmint , which has a high menthol content and a sharp flavor and is used in cooking, especially in herb teas and in confections .
Any of various eucalypts of southeastern Australia whose leaves yield peppermint-like essential oils .
Any of various sweets containing extract of the peppermint herb; peppermint confectionery .

main_definition: A hybrid herb of the mint family ( Mentha × piperita ), formed by crossing watermint and spearmint , which has a high menthol content and a sharp flavor and is used in cooking, especially in herb teas and in confections . [from 17th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( Australia ) Any of various eucalypts of southeastern Australia whose leaves yield peppermint-like essential oils . [from 18th c.]
( countable ) Any of various sweets containing extract of the peppermint herb; peppermint confectionery . [from 19th c.]
